name: Name
nameAtLeastOneCharacter: Name must have at least one character
emailErrorMessage: Invalid email address, please enter a valid email address
passwordErrorMessage: Password must have at least 8 characters, contain 1 uppercase letter, 1 lowercase letter, 1 number and 1 special character
DenisInfo:
Denis took on the role of team lead and made a great contribution to the development
                of the project, Denis was involved in setup, routing and also ensured that the
                deployment was always up to date and working, Denis also made a pull request for
                cross-check verification
EvgeniyInfo:
In this project, Zhenya tried to demonstrate his programming skills and did
                everything that was given to him, namely, in his part, there were tasks such as
                query query editor, variable and header editor, and Zhenya also worked on basic
                styles
AndreyInfo:
In this project, Andrey also worked on queries in the graphQL, introduced redux into
                the project and wrote reducers and the main state in order to be able to make
                queries on the graphQL and change the endpoint, Andrey also worked on fixing bugs
aboutProject:
This web application was created so that you can test a request for a graphQL, in it you
          can change the final address for the request (endpoint), you can change the body of the
          request and, of course, see the response from the server to your request, you can request
          the general graphQL scheme and much more, the application has Russian and English
          localization
aboutCourse:
The web application was created by a team of developers from the RSSchool course. all
          requirements and implementation features are dictated by the requirements for the task.
          The course is simply excellent and wonderful! I advise everyone, if you want to sign up,
          here are the links to view the future schedule.
